topicTitle: An idea to improve the server

posts.postText:
Hey guys, if there is one thing I hate it is doing 90000000 welds cus my boat is so freaking big, so that is why I propose the addition of "Smart Weld" to the server. Now, I am no coder and I have no experience in coding at all so I don;t know if it is difficult to add new tools to the server but Here is a link to Smart Weld. http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=18508 

Basically what this tool does is do a shit ton of welds for you by only left clicking each piece u need welded once....not 90000000 times. So say if u make an 8 prop boat, instead of clicking your props 72 times, you click on ur props 8 times, then do a nice right click and baddah bing baddah boom, your done. Again, this idea will probably fall through, but just throwing it out there. 

Thanks  ;D
